revised_title: A Dynamical Theory of Electric and Luminiferous Medium: Part III
tldr: This article presents a dynamical theory of the electric and luminiferous medium, focusing on the relations with material media. The author introduces the concept of aether as the seat of the elastic transmission of electric and magnetic forces and discusses the interactions between different portions of matter. The theory provides a more precise understanding of electric currents, moving material media, and electric radiation.
